title: "Meat, Potatoes" Guy Who Cooks Indian Food: JD Vance's Wife Describes Him
content: Usha Chilukuri Vance, wife of JD Vance, Donald Trump's vice-presidential pick, spoke at the Republican National Convention in Milwaukee where she revealed her husband's culinary skills in Indian cuisine.
summary: Usha Chilukuri Vance, wife of JD Vance, Donald Trump's vice-presidential pick, spoke at the Republican National Convention in Milwaukee where she revealed her husband's culinary skills in Indian cuisine.

title: "Press Button To Die": Switzerland To Soon Use Portable Suicide Pods
content: An assisted dying group expects a portable suicide pod to be used for the first time in Switzerland, potentially within months, providing death without medical supervision, it said Wednesday.
summary: An assisted dying group expects a portable suicide pod to be used for the first time in Switzerland, potentially within months, providing death without medical supervision, it said Wednesday.

title: US Cop Who Laughed After Indian Student Jaahnavi Kandula's Death Fired
content: A Seattle police officer, whose insensitive comments and laughter following the death of an Indian student had caused outrage, has been fired.
summary: A Seattle police officer, whose insensitive comments and laughter following the death of an Indian student had caused outrage, has been fired.

title: On Kamala Harris vs JD Vance Debate, Trump Campaign Shares Big Update
content: The campaign for former US president and the Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump has said that it will not commit to vice-presidential debate dates until after the Democratic National Convention, starting August 19.
summary: The campaign for former US president and the Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump has said that it will not commit to vice-presidential debate dates until after the Democratic National Convention, starting August 19.

title: Joe Biden's Covid Case Delivers Latest Blow to Hard-Luck Campaign
content: President Joe Biden's hopes of counter-programming the Republican National Convention were dashed Wednesday after he learned he had contracted COVID-19, forcing him to cancel an appearance before a key Latino advocacy group.
summary: President Joe Biden's hopes of counter-programming the Republican National Convention were dashed Wednesday after he learned he had contracted COVID-19, forcing him to cancel an appearance before a key Latino advocacy group.

title: UK Covid-19 Inquiry To Issue First Report On Preparedness
content: A public inquiry examining Britain's response to the COVID-19 outbreak will issue its first report on Thursday, focusing on how well prepared the nation was for handling such a pandemic.
summary: A public inquiry examining Britain's response to the COVID-19 outbreak will issue its first report on Thursday, focusing on how well prepared the nation was for handling such a pandemic.

title: Secret Service Head To Testify To US House Panel On Trump Shooting
content: Secret Service Director Kimberly Cheatle has agreed to testify before the U.S. House of Representatives Oversight Committee on July 22 for a hearing related to the shooting of former President Donald Trump at a rally, the panel said on Wednesday.
summary: Secret Service Director Kimberly Cheatle has agreed to testify before the U.S. House of Representatives Oversight Committee on July 22 for a hearing related to the shooting of former President Donald Trump at a rally, the panel said on Wednesday.

title: Florida Man Arrested For Making Threats Against Biden
content: A Florida man has been arrested for making threats against US President Joe Biden, just days after an assassination attempt on his Republican rival Donald Trump.
summary: A Florida man has been arrested for making threats against US President Joe Biden, just days after an assassination attempt on his Republican rival Donald Trump.

title: Joe Biden Tests Positive For Covid As Age Worries Mount
content: US President Joe Biden tested positive for Covid on Wednesday, shortly after conceding that he would consider dropping his troubled reelection bid if he was diagnosed with a serious medical condition.
summary: US President Joe Biden tested positive for Covid on Wednesday, shortly after conceding that he would consider dropping his troubled reelection bid if he was diagnosed with a serious medical condition.

title: Biden Says Could Drop Election Bid If "Medical Condition" Emerged
content: US President Joe Biden said he might re-evalute his election bid if a "medical condition" emerged, according to an extract of an interview released Wednesday, as his health faces scrutiny after a disastrous debate.
summary: US President Joe Biden said he might re-evalute his election bid if a "medical condition" emerged, according to an extract of an interview released Wednesday, as his health faces scrutiny after a disastrous debate.

title: Russia Says It's Ready To Work With Any US Leader
content: Russia is prepared to work with any US president who is open to dialogue, its foreign minister said Wednesday.
summary: Russia is prepared to work with any US president who is open to dialogue, its foreign minister said Wednesday.

title: 3 People Die After Drowning In Lake In Telangana: Cops
content: Two men and a 12-year-old girl have died after drowning in a lake in the Suryapet district of Telangana, police said.
summary: Two men and a 12-year-old girl have died after drowning in a lake in the Suryapet district of Telangana, police said.

title: US Military Declares End Of Troubled Gaza Aid Pier Mission
content: The US military's problem-plagued mission to deliver aid to Gaza via a temporary pier has ended, a senior American officer said on Wednesday.
summary: The US military's problem-plagued mission to deliver aid to Gaza via a temporary pier has ended, a senior American officer said on Wednesday.

title: "Assassination Attempt Has Sealed The Election": Trump's Close Aide
content: Unless a miracle happens for Democrats, Donald Trump is set to be the 47th President of the United States of America, a beaming Shalabh Kumar, a close aide of Trump, told NDTV.
summary: Unless a miracle happens for Democrats, Donald Trump is set to be the 47th President of the United States of America, a beaming Shalabh Kumar, a close aide of Trump, told NDTV.

title: China Can't Defeat US If We Revive "American Dream": Vivek Ramaswamy
content: Indian-origin Republican leader Vivek Ramaswamy, during the Republican National Convention, stressed the 'American Dream' and called on people to shed all forms of fear and be free to speak up their minds.
summary: Indian-origin Republican leader Vivek Ramaswamy, during the Republican National Convention, stressed the 'American Dream' and called on people to shed all forms of fear and be free to speak up their minds.

title: US Agency Probing Secret Service's Security Handling At Trump Rally Shooting
content: The US Department of Homeland Security's inspector general said Wednesday that it is investigating the Secret Service's handling of security at the campaign rally where a gunman tried to assassinate former president Donald Trump.
summary: The US Department of Homeland Security's inspector general said Wednesday that it is investigating the Secret Service's handling of security at the campaign rally where a gunman tried to assassinate former president Donald Trump.

title: Russia, Ukraine Exchange 95 Prisoners Of War
content: Russia and Ukraine have released a total of 190 captured soldiers in the latest prisoner exchange between the two sides, officials in Moscow and Kyiv announced Wednesday.
summary: Russia and Ukraine have released a total of 190 captured soldiers in the latest prisoner exchange between the two sides, officials in Moscow and Kyiv announced Wednesday.

title: "Press This Button": Portable Suicide Pod To Be Used In Switzerland Soon
content: An assisted dying group expects a new portable suicide pod to be used for the first time in Switzerland potentially within months to provide death without medical supervision, they said Wednesday.
summary: An assisted dying group expects a new portable suicide pod to be used for the first time in Switzerland potentially within months to provide death without medical supervision, they said Wednesday.

title: UK's New Government Vows To Remove 92 Unelected Peers From Upper House
content: The UK government on Wednesday announced plans to axe 92 House of Lords seats retained for hereditary lawmakers, resurrecting reform of the unelected chamber started under Tony Blair's Labour government in the 1990s.
summary: The UK government on Wednesday announced plans to axe 92 House of Lords seats retained for hereditary lawmakers, resurrecting reform of the unelected chamber started under Tony Blair's Labour government in the 1990s.

title: Record Heat Temperatures In Ukraine After Russian Attacks On Power Plants
content: Several cities across Ukraine were recording historic scorching temperatures, officials said Wednesday, at a time when major urban hubs are suffering long periods without electricity after Russian attacks on power plants.
summary: Several cities across Ukraine were recording historic scorching temperatures, officials said Wednesday, at a time when major urban hubs are suffering long periods without electricity after Russian attacks on power plants.
